step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms straight and fingers open as you prepare to move.
As you stretch your arms overhead, ensure your fingers remain open.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Excellent! You're stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep the movement smooth.
You've completed the first repetition. Focus on controlled movements and breathing.
Second repetition starting well. Maintain comfortable posture and open fingers.
Continue to stretch arms overhead with fingers open.
Nicely done making a fist and squeezing shoulder blades. Remember to inhale during this phase.
Good extension overhead while exhaling. Keep the motion controlled.
You've finished the exercise! Great effort in completing both repetitions with good form.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you make a fist. Continue practicing these controlled movements to help with arm strength and lymph drainage.
